adjective.description: Of, belonging to, or designating the Ahousaht, the principal group of Nuu-chah-nulth living around Clayoquot Sound on the west coast of Vancouver Island, British Columbia, Canada.

origin: Late 18th century. From Nootka ʕaaḥuusʔatḥ, self-designation, lit. people of Ahous (a place on Vargas Island, off Vancouver Island).
